name: STG_CONTACT_INFO
description: This table stores contact-specific information for a cancer stage (STG) record. Each row in this table corresponds to a single set of edits that were all saved at the same time.

columns.name: STAGE_ID
columns.description: The cancer stage (STG) row ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: STG_CSN
columns.description: A unique serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all stage (STG) contacts in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: A sequential number to identify this contact uniquely within the cancer stage (STG) row. The first contact is number 1, the second is number 2, etc.

columns.name: STAGE_EDIT_DATETIME
columns.description: The instant this contact was created.

columns.name: STAGE_EDIT_USR_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who created this contact.

columns.name: STAGE_EDIT_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: A category value indicating the laterality (left, right, or both) of the cancer being staged, for a disease such as lung cancer or breast cancer which might affect one or both sides of the body. This column should be empty for a disease such as colon cancer which can only affect one area of the body.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_MM
columns.description: The size of the primary tumor. This value is always stored in millimeters, although the user may choose to display this value in centimeters instead.

columns.name: TUM_SIZ_DISP_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The preferred unit of measurement (millimeters or centimeters) to use when displaying the primary tumor size for this contact of the cancer stage record.

columns.name: STG_SPECMN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: A category value indicating the type of specimen that was collected to analyze the tumor.

columns.name: HISTOPATH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: A category value indicating the histopathologic type of the patient's cancer.

columns.name: PATH_NODES_EXAM
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes examined for pathologic staging.

columns.name: PATH_POS_NODES
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes that tested positive for cancer for pathologic staging.

columns.name: CLIN_NODES_EXAM
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes examined for clinical staging.

columns.name: CLIN_POS_NODES
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes that tested positive for cancer for clinical staging.

columns.name: PATH_CEA_LVL
columns.description: The patient's carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA) level, in ng/mL, entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of colorectal cancer.

columns.name: CLIN_CEA_LVL
columns.description: The patient's carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA) level, in ng/mL, entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of colorectal cancer.

columns.name: PATH_PSA_LVL
columns.description: The patient's prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level, in ng/mL, entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: PATH_PRIM_GLEASON
columns.description: The primary Gleason pattern (1-5), entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: PATH_SEC_GLEASON
columns.description: The secondary Gleason pattern (1-5), entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: CLIN_PSA_LVL
columns.description: The patient's prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level, in ng/mL, entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: CLIN_PRIM_GLEASON
columns.description: The primary Gleason pattern (1-5), entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: CLIN_SEC_GLEASON
columns.description: The secondary Gleason pattern (1-5), entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of prostate cancer.

columns.name: PATH_FIBROSIS_SCORE
columns.description: A numeric score (0-6) indicating the severity of fibrosis, entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of liver cancer.

columns.name: PATH_FIBROSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: A code value (0 meaning "F0", or 1 meaning "F1") indicating the severity of fibrosis, entered as part of the pathologic stage for an incidence of liver cancer. F0 corresponds to a fibrosis score of 0 to 4, while F1 corresponds to a score of 5 or 6.
entries: F0 - Fibrosis score 0-4 (none to moderate fibrosis)
F1 - Fibrosis score 5-6 (severe fibrosis or cirrhosis)

columns.name: CLIN_FIBROSIS_SCORE
columns.description: A numeric score (0-6) indicating the severity of fibrosis, entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of liver cancer.

columns.name: CLIN_FIBROSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: A code value (0 meaning "F0", or 1 meaning "F1") indicating the severity of fibrosis, entered as part of the clinical stage for an incidence of liver cancer. F0 corresponds to a fibrosis score of 0 to 4, while F1 corresponds to a score of 5 or 6.

columns.name: PATH_VISUAL_ACUITY
columns.description: A description of the patient's visual acuity, using Snellen shorthand or an equivalent system, entered as part of the pathologic stage for a malignant melanoma of the uvea.

columns.name: CLIN_VISUAL_ACUITY
columns.description: A description of the patient's visual acuity, using Snellen shorthand or an equivalent system, entered as part of the clinical stage for a malignant melanoma of the uvea.

columns.name: PATH_METS_BIOPSY_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether a biopsy of the metastatic site was taken in conjunction with the pathologic stage.

columns.name: PATH_METS_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: A category value specifying the source of the metastatic specimen taken in conjunction with the pathologic stage (if any).

columns.name: CLIN_METS_BIOPSY_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether a biopsy of the metastatic site was taken in conjunction with the clinical stage.

columns.name: CLIN_METS_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: A category value specifying the source of the metastatic specimen taken in conjunction with the clinical stage (if any).

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_STG_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC clinical stage grouping for this contact.

columns.name: OT_CLIN_MULT_TUM_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether the clinical stage was documented based on the presence of multiple primary tumors.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_T_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC primary tumor (T) assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_N_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC regional lymph nodes (N) assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_M_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC distant metastasis (M) assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_G_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC histologic grade (G) assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_SER_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC serum tumor markers (S) assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_CLIN_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC risk factors assessment for this contact of the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_FIGO_CLIN_STG_C_NAME
columns.description: The clinical FIGO stage for an incidence of gynecologic cancer.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_STG_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC pathologic stage grouping for this contact.

columns.name: OT_PATH_MULT_TUM_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether the pathologic stage was documented based on the presence of multiple primary tumors.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_T_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC primary tumor (T) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_N_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC regional lymph nodes (N) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_M_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC distant metastasis (M) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_G_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC histologic grade (G) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_SER_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC serum tumor markers (S) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_PATH_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC risk factors assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_FIGO_PATH_STG_C_NAME
columns.description: The pathologic FIGO stage for an incidence of gynecologic cancer.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_RESIDUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC residual tumor (R) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_LV_INV_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC lymphatic vessel invasion (L) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_AJCC_VEN_INV_C_NAME
columns.description: The AJCC venous invasion (V) assessment for this contact of the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_UNK_PRIM_SITE_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether the primary tumor site is uncertain and therefore can only be suspected.

columns.name: OT_CLIN_STAGE_STS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the clinical stage on this contact.

columns.name: OT_CLIN_SIGN_USR_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who signed the clinical stage.

columns.name: OT_CLIN_SIGN_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OT_CLIN_SIGN_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the clinical stage was signed.

columns.name: OT_PATH_STAGE_STS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the pathologic stage on this contact.

columns.name: OT_PATH_SIGN_USR_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who signed the pathologic stage.

columns.name: OT_PATH_SIGN_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OT_PATH_SIGN_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the pathologic stage was signed.

columns.name: STAGE_EPT_ENC_DAT
columns.description: Stores the contact date (DAT) of the patient (EPT) contact in which this STG contact was edited. Set to 99999 if the stage is edited in a patient chart outside of an encounter.

columns.name: STAGE_EPT_ENC_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the patient encounter in which this stage contact was edited. Empty if the stage is edited in a patient chart outside of an encounter.

columns.name: STAGE_ENC_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the department (DEP) ID of the patient encounter in which this stage contact was edited. Empty if the stage is edited in a patient chart outside of an encounter.

columns.name: STAGE_LOGIN_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the login department (DEP) ID of the user who edited this stage (STG) contact.

columns.name: STG_DEF_ID
columns.description: Cancer staging form (FCS) record ID of the staging form that was used when entering the cancer staging information in this contact.

columns.name: STG_DEF_DAT
columns.description: Contact date of the cancer staging form (FCS) contact for the staging form that was used when entering the cancer staging information in this contact.

columns.name: STG_DEF_CSN
columns.description: Contact serial number of the cancer staging form (FCS) contact for the staging form that was used when entering the cancer staging information in this contact.

columns.name: DX_CONFIRM_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the best method used to confirm the presence of a patient's cancer being reported to a cancer registry.
entries: Positive histology PLUS positive immunophenotyping and/or positive genetic studies
Positive microscopic confirmation, method not specified
Radiography and other imaging techniques without microscopic confirmation
Unknown whether or not microscopically confirmed (e.g., death certificate only)

columns.name: CLIN_STAGED_BY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the person or people who assigned the AJCC staging elements and stage group when staging a patient's cancer diagnosis.
entries: Cancer Committee chair, cancer liaison physician, or registry physician advisor
Case is not eligible for staging
Unknown; not stated in patient's record

columns.name: STAGING_DATE
columns.description: Allows the user to specify a date associated with the staging information being entered.

columns.name: BODY_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the calculated or user-selected body site of this cancer stage.

columns.name: STAGE_FORM_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the method or version of the staging form used to document this stage.

columns.name: CLASSIFICATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the specific classification (clinical, pathologic, etc.) of this stage.

columns.name: DATA_MODEL_VER_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the version of this stage record's data model, used to indicate which items it uses in the Diagnosis Stage (STG) master file.

columns.name: STAGE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date associated with this stage.

columns.name: STAGE_GROUP
columns.description: Stores the stage group as an easily accessible string. This value is obtained from a SmartData element on the stage form.

columns.name: STAGE_DESC
columns.description: Stores a short description of this stage, typically including key values recorded by the user.

columns.name: STAGE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the status (unsigned, signed, deleted, etc.) of this stage.

columns.name: SIGN_USER_ID
columns.description: If signed, stores the user who signed this stage.

columns.name: SIGN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SIGN_DATETIME
columns.description: If signed, stores the instant in UTC that the stage was signed.

columns.name: STAGE_DT_FALLBACK_TO_CREATE_DT
columns.description: Stores the user-entered stage date, or if empty, the record creation date.
